alert.note: Alert for Meade (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Meade County through 545 PM CDT... At 459 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Meade State Park, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Meade State Park and Meade. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
